page.title: 08Education in the Salem Area.
page.content: {Pre-school}-A pre-school playgroup is held weekly in the Memorial Hall.Welsh and English speaking children from the age of eighteen months attend. {Primary} -The former Welsh language based Independent primary school in Salem,under the headship of Mr. George Jenkins for some 25 yrs, was finally closed in 1983. Its closure, strongly opposed by villagers, means that all the children aged 3 to 11yrs have to be transported either to Llandeilo English Primary school or Ysgol Teilo Sant, a bilingual school. 60% of the children travelling on the bus attend the English school. {Secondary} -11-18yr olds travel either to Tregyb (English medium, Llandeilo) or to Carmarthen,either to Bro Myrddin (Welsh ) or Queen Elizabeth Cambria (English medium).The nearest Catholic secondary is at Llanelli.
